column1: | All reversing moves from either platform towards the Up Alton line must either be routed all the way from WK443 to |
| WK449 via WK1383 or to be routed from WK1381 towards WK1383 into Farnham Shed. If the shed is to be used           |
| to perform a reversal, permission must be obtained from the Shunter. Please note that if the route towards WK449   |
| is under possession and a slot in unavailable at the depot, a reversal past WK438 will not possible.               |
